description: ff. 4. 189 x 139; 148 x 108 mm. 20 lin. Shaʻbān 865, Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jaʻfarī al-ḥanbalī al-Nābulusī. Riwāyah of Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Dāmaqānī (19 subsequent ruwāh are listed on title page, fol. 1a, the last being ʻAbd al-Salām al-Shaṭṭī, 1274 H.). Incip.: ... اخبرنا ... سراج الدىن ابو الحفص ... المعروف بابن الملقن الشافعى قراة علىه ونحن نسمع فى نصف شوال سنة سبع وتسعىن وسبعمائة بالمدرسة السابقىة بالقاهرة
author: Qudūrī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 972 or 3-1037
title: Juzʼ fīhi min ḥadīth Abī al-ḥusayn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Jaʻfar al-Qudūrī.
creator: Qudūrī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 972 or 3-1037
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
